data.title: Mila Kunis opens up about Ashton Kutcher's marriage with Demi Moore
data.meta_description:
Actor Mila Kunis says her husband Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore's eight-year-old marriage was "normal, real".
Opening up about Kutcher's first marriage, Kunis, 34, said, "They had, like, a normal, real relationship. They had three kids they were raising. It was, like, a normal life."
"He was younger but he loved those kids," she said, referring to Moore's daughters with actor Bruce Willis.
Kutcher, 40, married Kunis after his divorce from Moore, 55, and they have two children together.
Speaking on WTF with Marc Maron podcast, "The Spy Who Dumped Me" actor said Kutcher is still in touch with Moore's kids.
Talking about her own relationship with Kutcher, who worked with her on "That '70s Show", Kunis said there were "no feelings whatsoever" while they were on the show.
"It's the weirdest story that nobody believes but it's the God's honest truth. You know, he and I talk about it and we're like, 'God'."
"Had we connected, would we have connected? No. The people that we were back then ...
data.text: Disclaimer: No Business Standard Journalist was involved in creation of this content
